response.overview: 7 Minutes - A Short Film In just seven minutes, a lifetime can change. A boy carries a love he never dares to speak, holding it close through the years. When fate finally gives him a chance, it's already slipping away. What follows is a journey through silent emotions, unspoken words, and the haunting weight of "what could have been." A debut film crafted with love, passion, and the belief that some stories are meant to be felt more than told.
response.tagline: A debut film crafted with love, passion, and the belief that some stories are meant to be felt more than told.
response.title: 7 Minutes
